subcategory.name: Cards
subcategory.description: Cards, wells, and panel examples for Tailwind CSS, designed and built by the creators of the framework.
subcategory.introduction: Use these Tailwind CSS card components to break your dashboards, profile pages, or admin interfaces up into smaller cards and wells for things like charts, tables, or forms. These components are designed and built by the Tailwind CSS team, and include a variety of different styles and layouts.
